subject: Problems using command line parameters in test cases
msgSnippet: Can somebody help explain how to use command line parameters in test cases. I have the following main method in my test case. public static void main(String[]
messageBody:
Can somebody help explain how to use command line parameters in test
cases. I have the following main method in my test case.

public static void main(String[] args) {
propFile = args[0];
String[] name = {PCAModelTest.class.getName()};
TestRunner.main(name);
}

I try to pass the name of the property file to use to configure the test
fixture as a command line parameter. The propFile variable is a static
defined in the test case. When I enter the setUp method of my test case,
propFile is null. I don't know what's going on here. Can somebody help
explain it to me and possibly tell me how I can achieve my desired
result of using command line parameters in my setUp method?

Grant
